message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. This gives us both a good chunk of the money.
My turn! Let's make it a bit more even. This offer still gives us both a good amount.
I understand you want a more even split, but the inflation is working against you, Bob.  This is a strong offer considering the circumstances.
Okay, Alice, let's find a compromise. This is closer to your offer, but still acknowledges the impact of inflation on my side.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my final offer - it's a good deal considering the inflation hitting your side.
Alice, we're getting dangerously close to losing it all. This is my compromise - it's more than your last offer, and time is running out!
